about_the_game:
Library of Meialia is a 2D pixel art rogue-like adventure where you play as Amlos, a curious young dragon navigating the sprawling, enigmatic Library of Meialia—a place where you don’t quite belong. As you journey through the endless halls, you’ll face off against the library's sentinels and ancient beasts long sealed away. Along the way, forge friendships with diverse characters, uncover hidden secrets, and grow stronger with every battle. Immerse yourself in this meticulously hand-crafted pixel library, where every corner offers both opportunity and peril, all set to a beautifully composed soundtrack.

Soar Through the Library—Until You Can't…

As Amlos, the young dragon, your wings allow you to fly effortlessly through the library, scale walls and explore unknown corridors . But beware—some rooms will ground you, forcing you to tread carefully with your claws.

Knowledge is Power

The Library of Meialia is the ultimate center of magical knowledge. On your quest to master Aethium magic, you’ll discover magic books and pages scattered throughout, each offering new skills to aid your journey. With over 70 skills to unlock, the possibilities are endless. Take your discoveries to the Aethiumeter and use your newfound powers to conquer any obstacle in your path.

Unleash the Sealed Beasts

Each level of the library contains terrifying monsters, sealed away for students to study. But you’ll face them head-on, battling through their varied attack patterns and relentless bullet hells. You'll need to defeat them to prove your worth and advance deeper into the library. But remember—greater dangers lie in wait at each level's end…

No Two Explorations Are Alike

The Library of Meialia is never the same. Thanks to its random map generation, each playthrough in the library offers a fresh experience. New paths, new challenges, and new treasures await every time you step inside. Grab your magic books and prepare for the unexpected!

In the Library, but not Just the Library

The library is only the beginning. Within its walls, lies a world rich with stories and knowledge waiting to be uncovered. Discover ancient histories and secrets hidden within the library's shelves, revealing the true nature of the world around you.

short_description: To uncover the secrets of Aethium Magic in the Library of Meialia, you’ve set out to prove your worth. Faced with doubts, pursuing forces, and sealed monsters, this journey is fraught with danger... Collect books, gather weapons, and explore the grand library alongside a diverse array of companions.
